vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κοδράντης, ου, ὁ,
= Latin quadrans, = 1/4 of an as, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: penny, small Roman coin, about one-sixty-fourth of a denarius (a day’s wage)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
penny, small Roman coin, about one-sixty-fourth of a denarius (a day’s wage)
a Roman brass coin, equivalent to the fourth part of an as, or ἀσσάριον, or to δύο λεπτά, Mt. 5:26; Mk. 12:42*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: cuadrante (moneda de cobre de muy poco valor en el sistema romano: 1/4 de un as o 1/64 de un denario)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 羅馬銅幣, 一分錢 (太 5:26; 可 12:42)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 罗马铜币, 一分钱 (太 5:26; 可 12:42)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: xu đồng; đồng tiền. một phần tư đồng xu Rô-ma
